To the ones who repeatedly ask why this is NRT

NTR is defined as stealing someone's loved ones from them.

Baldy has the full intention to emotionally torment the poor kid and show him he stole his sister's from him and that was the only reason he even got close to him in the first place.

So why are you asking why this is NTR?

This isn't Netori either as that is usually shown as the MC having a reason to steal the loved one like he was too late to confess his feeling or the woman/man in question is unsatisfied or being hurt in anyway by their so called loved one.

This is nothing like that.
Netorare06: So stealing someone's sex-slave sluts because you have the bigger, better dick wouldn't be netorare?

Look, I know many don't like ntr or talk about cucks, but there are many different ones. The best ones are when the mc is neglecting his parter and she finds better comfort. The bad ones are the ones with straight up rape. Also, most of those who like ntr are usually imagining themselves as those who are stealing, the ones who don't are true cucks.
